name: Stone Pickaxe
description: The Stone Pickaxe is the first Pickaxe available to prospectors and is used to break apart mineable Minerals , reducing them to usable resources. Stone, Sulfur, Oxite, Silica, Coal, Salt, Copper, Iron, Gold, and Exotic nodes can be mined with a Stone Pickaxe. To mine Aluminium, Platinum, and Titanium, prospectors must use a Steel Pickaxe or better.
